array.string: launchctl setenv MATLABPATH $MATLABPATH:/Applications/${CPACK_PACKAGE_NAME}/share/optizelle/matlab launchctl setenv OCTAVE_PATH $OCTAVE_PATH:/Applications/${CPACK_PACKAGE_NAME}/share/optizelle/octave launchctl setenv PYTHONPATH $PYTHONPATH:/Applications/${CPACK_PACKAGE_NAME}/lib/python${PYTHON_VERSION_MAJOR}.${PYTHON_VERSION_MINOR}/site-packages
